That's why Xenoverse makes sense.
I mean, you're just a nobody who simply came out of nowhere and had the privilege to beat up Frieza, Cell, and Buu alongside canon characters. That is something many in the Pony fandom would love to be able to do with their OCs in the Ponyverse. Beat up Nightmare Moon and Chrysalis alongside Twilight and her friends.
